Name: S.P.A.T.
About the game: You have a unique opportunity to feel like an operator of a special squad to fight paranormal creatures and monsters (Special Paranormal Assault Team - S.P.A.T.). Single play with AI or team play (up to 3 people in a squad). Choose Your Equipment Carefully Before a Mission. You don't know what kind of monsters you have to face. The type of ammo, bait and search devices can all save the lives of you and your teammates on a mission. Everyone does their job Everyone in the squad has a role - a searcher, support and hunter. Do your job and the mission will be completed. Something in the mist Not only one alpha monster (3 types at this moment - Werewolf, Wendigo and Yeti) is waiting for you in the dark, but also many different minions, be careful! Be in the light Not only monsters are dangerous, in the paranormal zone, if you are not in the light, you can lose your mind. Check the indicator on your hand, be in the light, wait for the dawn or blame yourself. Join Those Who are Already Fighting Monsters!
